verses.verse: "Dominion <S%H4910><s%> and awe <S%H6343><s%> belong to Him Who establishes <S%H6213><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> in His heights. <S%H4791><s%>
"Is there <S%H3426><s%> any <S%H3426><s%> number <S%H4557><s%> to His troops <S%H1416><s%>? And upon whom <S%H4310><s%> does His light <S%H216><s%> not rise <S%H6965><s%>?
"How <S%H4100><s%> then can a man <S%H582><s%> be just <S%H6663><s%> with God <S%H410><s%>? Or how <S%H4100><s%> can he be clean <S%H2135><s%> who is born <S%H3205><s%> of woman <S%H802><s%>?

"If <S%H2005><s%> even <S%H5704><s%> the moon <S%H3394><s%> has <S%H166><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> brightness <S%H166><s%> And the stars <S%H3556><s%> are not pure <S%H2141><s%> in His sight, <S%H5869><s%>
How <S%H637><s%> much <S%H637><s%> <S%H3588><s%> less <S%H637><s%> man, <S%H582><s%> [that] maggot, <S%H7415><s%> And the son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> [that] worm! <S%H9641><s%>"
